channel.title: Maya Kristalinskaya on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Maya Kristalinskaya on Rusland 1

item.title: Maya Kristalinskaya – Tenderness
item.description: Film Known, among other things, for this film scene (starting at 1:30 min), from Три тополя на Плющихе or Three Poplars in Plyushchikha (1967). Definitely watch these three minutes from that film, featuring music by La Kristalinskaya. Performances The song, written in 1965 by Александра Пахмутова (Aleksandra Pakhmutova), has been performed many times.
